website_summaries.verdict: Thorough and highly effective gel bait for commercial, industrial, or residential use to control roach infestations.
pros: Eliminates all prevailing species of cockroaches
Works through combination of highly attractive roach bait and non-repellent active ingredient that kills the roaches
Very versatile in terms of places it can be used — indoors or outdoors, even in food-handling areas
cons: A small percentage of users had mixed reviews on its effectiveness, although placement of the gel seems to be an important factor and may require some experimentation

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used this product in the past and it was amazing and I gave it 5 stars. I don’t know if they changed the formula or what but when I moved my home had a roach problem so I ordered this again as it was awesome in my previous home and after one use I saw dead bugs within 30 minutes and then after a couple days no bugs but this time I haven’t seen one dead bug so not sure what they did to the product but it’s definitely not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: First time I got this it worked great, next 2 batches didn’t work at all. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewers, U bought this product 4 or 5 years ago and I had not seen a roach until last month. I ordered a new batch and I still see roaches. I have not swept up one dead roach. Very disappointed. I will sop somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Vernastene Black

customer_reviews.title: Must be a knock off.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work, I’m not sure if this was a knock off or what. But the last time I bought this it actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: This product did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product came expired and did not work at all. I purchased before and was amazing but this time waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Advion gets rid of Roaches fast, no mess no fuss
customer_reviews.text: Product works great for killing cockroaches. Apply gel Per manufactures instructions roaches come out and are attracted to gel. All cockroaches dead, you may have to reapply for straglers . I applied gel 5 weeks ago haven’t. Seen any roaches.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Alderette

customer_reviews.title: All hype, no results.
customer_reviews.text: Did a little controlled experiment to test how well this stuff works. This roach has ate its body weight in bait and over 18 hours later it is alive and well. I am highly frustrated because of how expensive this stuff was. Most reviews are very good, I don’t understand why mine isn’t working, maybe it’s a bad batch. Either way I’m seeking a refund and explanation as to why I just fed these roaches and didn’t exterminate them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought Advion from Amazon before from another seller and it was a miracle! It worked great, the roaches were gone in a matter of days. This time the advion didn't work. I wonder if there are "fake" products out there now since there is such a high demand. This product from this seller didn't work at all. I don't know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: lovemommy

customer_reviews.title: Really recommend this product!!💪
customer_reviews.text: Guys.... Today 10/13/2019 at 10:19 am .. I do say thing gel really works... I am impressed I have tried everything, I went to Lowe's and was always buying Home Defense and spraying outside 2 a week.. and inside 4 times a week and those cockroaches never leave..and they were growing and growing and having babies like crazy... Guys I bought this on Wednesday and today is Sunday.. this is amazing!!! Today I haven't seen a live cockroach...all I see dead ones.. Really recommend this product.. you guys will always remember my review!!! Will be forward in buying more, just to keep them away... Thanks Guys!!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Okay, bare with me on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Back story, I lived in section 8 housing, which obviously means you’ll have roaches. When I say those apartments were infested. I mean, they would fall on me when I slept. I got out as soon as I could. So fast forward to me getting my own house, of course those dang things came along with my furniture. I had an exterminator come out. Nothing. I bought this, Literally a week in there were a TON of roaches just dead on my kitchen floor. They are gone. This is crazy good. Don’t waste your time on an expensive exterminator, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Not working like it has in the past...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product in the past and swore by it. It always completely wiped out roaches within two weeks. I bought some of this for the third time and applied it like I always have. It’s been a couple weeks now and I’m not seeing results. I’ve not seen any dead or dying roaches at all- but have seen plenty of live ones. I don’t know what’s going on. I read some people on Amazon are selling fake bait. 😩 Not sure which seller to even trust now. I just know that whatever I actually got is not working at all. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The item doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We used all 8 tubes and still have roaches it didn't affect them at all ,now I have to buy other stuff , 2 years ago I used 4 tubes and it worked wonders maybe they change their solution
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME, DON'T WASTE UR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd time buying this. The 1st time almost 2 yrs ago it absolutely worked very well. This time, NOT SO MUCH! I was bragging to my husband just wait until tomorrow , u won't see not 1 roach! Humph 2 weeks later he says... ur gel didn't work, we still have roaches. It seems like the FORMULA HAS CHANGED!!
customer_reviews.author: Wife of Ellijiah

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, affordable, easy to use, bugs are gone. Don't waste your time on plastic roach motels and noxious bombs and sprays. This can be placed safely and inconspicuously around your home. The syringe allows you to get in the tight little places roaches love to hide
customer_reviews.author: ShayG

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought Advion Cockroach Gel Bait before, and it worked so effectively. This one I bought didn't work. I applied it in the same way as before, but the roaches were still running around everywhere after I used three times in about a month. I was wondering whether it's a fake product. I bought a fake one from Amazon before, and Amazon refunded me. I'm hoping Amazon refund me again for this one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth your purchase....
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in the past. Everytime a neighbor moves they stir up any bugs they have. Those bugs then will find a way to my place. The first time I encountered this problem, I had tried everything to no avail. I was so frustrated as I started finding babies. It was so disgusting. I was given this bait from my brother. To my amazement within 2 days and after 1 application, ALL cockroaches, babies and adults are gone! That was over a year ago! I just had another neighbor move and saw 2 cockroaches. I am so happy to just have this delivered! I will be pest free again! Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melloheart

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONLY effective roach killing product
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY effective roach killing product I have used that really gets rid all of the roaches. The building I live in has a lot of roaches and my apartment is almost always roach free. I find roaches maybe once a year in my apartment, I apply several pea sized drops where I see the roaches or where I feel they will enter and then I don't see them again for a very long time. My neighbor has a bad roach problem and I told him to buy Advion but he thinks an exterminator is a better option. It is not. Advion is the ONLY effective way of getting rid of roaches I have ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Ce

customer_reviews.title: love it this product it truly works .
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product july 27th 2020 I used it last night july 28th 2020 as you guys can tell in the video roaches are dead . I used many other product even got an exterminator and didn't completely exterminate them. But this product is doing the job. I will definitely buy more .
customer_reviews.author: Maritzapacheco93

customer_reviews.title: Kills Cockroach's dead !! works great !!
customer_reviews.text: Kills Cockroach's dead !!! We paid an exterminator 150 dollars to exterminate a Cockroach problem we had from bringing some items home from the flea market.. The exterminator told us about Syngenta 383920 Advion Cockroach Gel Bait and he said we could save a lot of money next time simply by buying this product and he even left us the remainder of a tube, So I took the tube out to our shed and applied the product in very small amounts to a couple areas inside the shed, left the shed for a day or 2 and went back and there were several dead Cockroach's same as inside the house.. I can say for sure this stuff works great !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheAntiqueReStore

customer_reviews.title: roach problem not solved
customer_reviews.text: I have regular pest control outside the house, but still spotted a couple of German Roaches several times in the kitchen, so I bought this Cockroach Gel bait trying to solve the problem myself. I spent about half an hour to apply the gel bait dot around kitchen as manual instructed 2 weeks ago, but yesterday, I just saw a very large roach again and disappeared under the fridge. So I feel it's just not working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Dried up very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if my product is expired or what.. but the bait dried up very quickly and I still see roaches crawling around. I had to speak to an Amazon representative to get approval for my refund. I've heard great things about this product, but sadly this particular one did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this purchase but took a chance. My house had become infested with small roaches after many attempts with natural alternatives which proved to be no help at all. I was amazed after just a couple of days with this product. Dead roaches all over the floor and now months later, I rarely see roaches at all, even at night. This is just like the professional products. However, it has a smell and chemical off-gas so do not use it in a place you will be spending a lot of time in. I recommend windows open for the first day of application.
customer_reviews.author: Valdoria

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure if this works for my roach variety.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this Syngenta roach gel for over a year. Although the quality of the gel is good, I’m not sure if it works on my roach type. I still have roaches after 1 year even though I placed the gel at regular intervals around the house. So, I have used this gel with regular roach bait traps. The gel has to be hidden form pets by placing it in more inaccessible places.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with any other bait. Get this and any supporting products.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not expecting much. I was ready to give up and spend a monthly $150 pest control service. I ordered because a friend I trust recommended it. I have to say I am so surprised by its performance. I took a week. In 24 hours our kitchen floor was covers in dead roaches. It was like that for 3 days. The 4th day was a lot less and the 5 day a few here and there. Second week. None. Never been this impressed with a product. Worth every penny and the fact I don't have to paid for a monthly service.
customer_reviews.author: A. CabreraTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had the occasional roach that would turn up in the mornings on its back. I got tired of disposing of them and researched this product. I put some around the door thresholds of the exterior doors and inside our sprinkler system valve boxes. Holy Moly!!!!! This stuff is amazing. Within 1 day all of the valve box dwellers were dead or gone. I haven’t seen one inside my house since I did the initial application, nearly 2 months ago! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and legitimate product. Worked great for infestation of the small friends that moved in. Recommended this product and that you buy from this seller, SEJ LLC.
customer_reviews.author: D Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as before
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product before and it worked miracles. 5 years later I buy again as the problem came back but this stuff is different color and didn't even work. Should have listened to the reviews claimong different formula. They were right. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Nice

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something that works!
customer_reviews.text: After using bug bombs and spraying at least half a dozen times we still had a problem. I finally decided to buy this based off the recommendation of a youtube video and this stuff began working within in hours! So much easier to use. I put a dot in the corners of cabinets and behind appliances. Paired with gentrol (to stop breeding cycle) and within a week the number has decreased significantly. I plan on buying another round after I deep clean and hopefully that solves our problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: For repeat offenders.
customer_reviews.text: This roach prevention only works for 3 weeks and then hardens. You have to keep buying it and putting it down fresh every time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stankevich

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t seen a cockroach in months
customer_reviews.text: I had a mild infestation in my apartment, around my dishwasher. I didn’t want to jump through hoops with management to get exterminators out in the middle of a pandemic, so I decided to try this product. Placed some less-than-pea-size dabs around what I thought were the problem areas and other cracks around my kitchen, and after a few months, I have yet to see another cockroach. For more serious infestations you may need additional products, but this worked perfectly for me. The only reason it’s 4 stars is the syringe I used leaked from the back after only light use.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Lucas

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works! We tried everything!
customer_reviews.text: With little kids sneaking food & stashing the leftovers & trash in every nook & cranny they can find, it’s impossible to not get roaches! So we started getting them & tried lots of products, none of them worked. Then I saw all the good reviews on this product & tried it. When I tell you that after we put this out, we saw dead roaches & “shaky” roaches & then none at all. And have been roach free ever since. Now I did do way more than recommend, I went crazy with that stuff everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrelia Merritt

customer_reviews.title: What happened Dupont?
customer_reviews.text: What happened, this doesnt work. It actually arrives a darker shade than it use too. I wonder if its old. Anyhow, I use to use this and without fail would find little dead roaches after one use. Then I'd see babies trying to come out a few weeks later and use it again. Now I don't see a single dead roach after using WTH?!?! I tried the plug ins amd they didn't work either. Any suggestions? I live in Hawaii and am always fighting this bug game. They be gangsta's in Paradise, these roaches.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ballou

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works!! Roaches love eating this product and it does not smell of chemicals. This is the only product that worked for me and got rid of all the roach problem at my house. I placed it behind warm areas such as the oven and the corners of the walls and appliances. You can place some on cardboard pieces and place it on counters and drawers for the roaches that crawl on them. After using all four tubes, I haven't had roaches in my house ever since. I purchased this product for my other family members and it worked perfectly for them as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: brandon m

customer_reviews.title: BYE ROACHES!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny! We couldn't afford yo bomb our apartment so we decided on this product. We applied and within a couple of hours we had roaches spamming and dying. We definitely weren't ready for it. For the next 24 hours they kept coming out their hiding spots to die. Definitely had to do a lot of sweeping and walking barefooted was not an option. It's been 4 weeks since we first applied it and now we are finding the hatched ones dead. It seems the product lasts a while. We still have one tube left but doubt we will need. It. Our apartment is 700 sq. ft.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT STUFF THAT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why flavor was a category to star as I didn't taste it. It's a pesticide! Anyway, I had exterminators come to my house twice to combat roaches in kitchen and my dad's bedroom. It didn't do much good. We also had exterminator come 2 or 3 times in our old location for same reason. Too many exterminators just use spray and not bait like this. Spray doesn't end roaches; bait does. This stuff is super easy to use AND it actually WORKS. I've noticed a marked improvement in the bug situation, and I highly recommend this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Click

customer_reviews.title: A W E S O M E
customer_reviews.text: We have the BIG wood roaches from living near a swampy area, old garden mulch, and an old stump in our front yard. They have been getting into the house recently so we tried this stuff. Well... this stuff really DRAWS THEM IN FOR THE KILL!!! Within a couple of minutes of placing this in some strategic spots outside there were several wood roaches gobbling it up. Two days later and I started seeing the carcasses of the dead ones on our front walkway and porch. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC AND REALLY WORKS FAST!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I noticed some small roaches behind my tv on my kitchen counter and have always used boric acid. It worked so so and there would always be white powder around. Advion works so well and fast. It is super easy to use and I was able to put it in places that my cats can't get to. After 3 days of seeing roaches coming out in the day barely moving, It took three days and voila all gone, REALLY!! Hard to believe any product works so well, but this one does. It's been 2 months and still NO ROACHES!!!
customer_reviews.author: silverfox13

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied and effective
customer_reviews.text: My house had been closed up for months. During that time, a serious infestation took place. Extremely effective and quickly eradicated everything. Only took two days to see a difference and dead bugs. Within a couple weeks, no more bugs. Followed other instructions such as closing off spaces they can enter or hide.
customer_reviews.author: Kdude

customer_reviews.title: Best Roach Control Product I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I tried using store bought roach control products and they did nothing that I noticed. I decided to try Syngenta Advion after wasting money on the others and it is the best thing I've found. I placed the product several places in cabinet's and along counter top walls and used an index card to put it on to slide under fridge and stove. When I woke the next morning there were dying and dead german roaches scattered all over the kitchen floor. I was surprised at the number of them. I am no longer seeing any roaches in my kitchen. I only had to use about half of one tube. Thank God I found this product. Money well spent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have my house infested with German Roaches,they have ruined my electronics ,mine Bose cd useless ,replaced twice I was shopping and this women told me to buy Advion ,I did and finally decided to use it .that was yesterday .this morning my kitchen floor was just scrolling with roches ,this stuff is amazing ,I spend fortune for spray roach killer ,made sure not to live food ,nothing works better then this Advion . I used everything you can think off ,love this product going to buy more .
customer_reviews.author: ljubica

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does nothing. I placed it around areas where I've seen roaches. I've tried using short thin strips, thick short strips, and small dots along the baseboards and walls where I've seen roaches and the product is left untouched and I still see roaches. I don't know if I was sent a knockoff product like others mentioned in their reviews or if I received the read thing. But this stuff is awful and it doesn't work. A huge waste of money. Boric acid works better than this stuff. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Whoa Lola

customer_reviews.title: You will see roach again .
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you if you have a roach problem this is absolutely the best product I’ve found by far ever that actually works . My building i is infested with roaches . not even the exterminator can fix it . But this !! This works it’s gone not one left . And I will continue to use and keep out with this . trust me have everyone but it no will Be having a roach problem again . only product I’m ever buying again .
customer_reviews.author: Gina  hires

customer_reviews.title: You will never buy anything else.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than this. Apply it as instructed. Bought it for the racing reviews. Now I buy it for several family members who need it. I recommend it to everyone with any type of roach problem, even a big roach infestation. Don't spend your money on anything else or hiring a professional for your roach problem. I have cats and dogs and I applied it on counters and inside cabinets without any issues to the animals. I was careful to try to not put it on the floor where they could get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Torres

customer_reviews.title: Best idea I ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: Out home is relatively clean, but we are attached to another home. During the summer last year squatters was living there till they were eventually forced out. Ending of that year roaches and other pets started coming over to our house. We hired about exterminator to come every other month, but we still had.. I have never seen results like this from this before..and it was from this product. This picture was from the morning after I placed from poison over night. One day result. Easy to use. No smell. I have kids and a dog, its safe. The poison was places under the floor boards so its not in sight or in contact with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Price per Roach Killed? IDK? Read more.
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to express its results? I mean I saw some dead a few days after I used it. It was easy to apply; I used gloves. I used slightly more than its recommended drop per 10 linear foot...Its killed about maybe 10-12? One actually exploded green slime on my tile? Price for Product, and cockroaches killed? What did I pay $30 buck? for 10-12 bugs? Do the Math? Well see, if anymore come out. I know they are there; Its a 100 yr. old home! One section near an old bathroom was bad! Thats where I got most?
customer_reviews.author: Rolly

customer_reviews.title: Advion works!
customer_reviews.text: Best rack kill on the market. But last 4 pm I bought was "melted" idk what proper word would be. It was not solid but squirted out in liquid form. I tried to shake it and even put in fridge for couple days. It never became solid gel. I've never seen it do that before. I meant to contact company but time got away. Other than that 1 pk it's terrific. Arvin will kill an infestation quick. Have your broom and vacuum ready. You'll see more dead than you dud alive.
customer_reviews.author: traci marshall

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: We got a fixer upper in the country that was infested with “wood roaches” (Germans that FLY) this stuff is absolutely amazing! One tube cleared our entire house! Diminished population noticed within two days! Now we’re a month since we’ve seen any creatures and deep into rainy season. VERY happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE BAIT!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 10 star if it was available! We have been fighting roaches for the past year! We’ve tried all the “off the shelf” products and nothing seemed to get rid of them all! I ordered this, received it on time and put it out everywhere! (Just one tube) and I can’t keep dead bugs off my floors! It only took 2 days for it to fully work! This stuff is a MIRACLE!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after a friend told me how good it worked on her grandfather's place a few years ago. Works very well, used 3 out of 4 tubes for a heavyish Florida mobile infestation. Knocked them out to where I treated just over a month ago now, noticed a difference within 2 days, and now only see one or 2 a week. Going to use the last tube tonight. Would be nice if they had a better deal on this with their Bates ( which I haven't tried yet because of the cost)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET IT YOU WONT REGRET IT!!
customer_reviews.text: We have (had) an issue with these GIANT waterbugs!! The look like huge cockroaches!!! NOT IN MY HOUSE!! I read the reviews and the day it arrived I started putting it in ever corner, crack crevice you name it! I saw 2 after the application that were barely alive and since then...NOTHING!!! I still have some left so if the decide to come back I'm ready! I highly recommend this product! I do have a dog so I made sure that I didn't place it anywhere he may have access to.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I found so far. When we moved into our house there were roaches. We’ve been trying to get rid of them forever. We put this out on a Monday and five days later I’m still having to sweep the floor 4-5 times a day because of dead bugs everywhere. We paired it with the bait traps of the same brand and it’s working great. I don’t know how long this will work long term because it’s only been five days but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: blushingmoon

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this is part of a multi-pronged approach to battle a severe roach infestation. The roaches were running to the attractant in this even while I was still moving about applying it. By itself, it provides directly identifiable results and carries back the poison to nests where they can feed on the poisoned carcass. Combined with Genitrol for reproductive control and a long-acting barrier spray, I am quickly getting the residence in question back under control.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette C. Dollar

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than anything I tried in the store or the spray the professional used in my apartment. I don't have any dramatic photos like some reviewers but this has been killing a few that I can see everyday for almost a week. It took over 24 hours before I saw one roach acting crazy then I started seeing multiple everyday. A little goes a long way so I wish I could buy 1 tube instead of 4. That's why I rated 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: curlylocs

customer_reviews.title: It works with ease of use and free from odors and mess.
customer_reviews.text: It works. The building next to mine was being run by squatters. In April, the new owner had the building abandoned and boarded up. Soon after, I started seeing a couple cockroaches in my kitchen. It didn’t take long for them to start overrunning my place. I used sprays and other products, but nothing worked to decrease the roach population in my apartment. A friend of mine told me about Advion gel, so I decided to give it a try. It really works. I put it down in the evening and work up the next morning to dead and straggling cockroaches. I definitely recommend it and will update my review in a month.
customer_reviews.author: deadcalm

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for American cockroaches
customer_reviews.text: The application and instructions were easy to use. I applied as the directions instructed for a moderate-heavy infestation (I typically see a cockroach every 2-3 nights) Now a lot of reviews mention fake bait or perhaps a watered down version and I am either inclined to believe this is what I received or contrary to the claims of the company this does not work against all roaches. My product was on the lighter side which seems to be the counterfeit product so I would say that if you're willing to gamble this is the product for you. But if you want to ensure that no cockroaches remain then I would advise another seller or product.
customer_reviews.author: E.B

customer_reviews.title: Super Effective
customer_reviews.text: I started to see roaches everywhere and was desperate to get rid off them. My daughter recommended this product and I used it at night and the next morning they where lots of dead roaches, now I don't see one. This is definitely a product I will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Power
customer_reviews.text: Living in a cool old building has its benefits, and just a few drawbacks. This gel overcomes one of those drawbacks. It is exceptionally effective. I've also found that an application in just a few small areas monthly or bi-monthly does the trick completely. I've used Advion for years and swear by its effectiveness. It's one of the pricier gels around, which is why I gave it 4 out of 5 on pricing, but the quality makes up for that. Strong recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Santa

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done where others fail.
customer_reviews.text: Some users have called this "cockroach crack" it is! Also great for dealing with silverfish. I had a slow water leak that encouraged a cockroach explosion in my kitchen. Sprays, bombs and powders were not doing anything to curb the hoard. After three days they were mostly gone. I reapply small amounts monthly to keep them at bay (I live in an apartment building) and shared with my neighbors. I love the stuff..but roaches love it even more!
customer_reviews.author: I JFe

customer_reviews.title: Bugs Be Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Waited a couple weeks to post a review just to see how well this actually worked first. I applied this to a trouble area I had in my apartment after the tenants above me moved out and caused activity to shift to my home. The first couple of days the bugs would come out all day (definitely more than I thought were hiding). Within 5 days I have seen no trace of any other creepy crawlers so I’m happy to say this product works! Also, a little bit goes a long way! So be careful when applying not to over do it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stremmel

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes and yes!
customer_reviews.text: One day and just a FEW placements and I came home to dead roaches on the floor. I haven’t even gotten into the real cracks and deep in my cabinets yet. My neighbors are GROSS and they definitely have them. I have lived in my apartment for over a year now and I have NEVER had roaches. Not in any other places I have ever lived. These people move in next door and all of a sudden... I have roaches? My apartment complex just runs through and “sprays” the floor but won’t fix any seals or do any real extermination. This has been the only thing to work so far. I will continue to use until there are no more!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of em
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbors house burned down and it had been pretty unkempt so we had an influx of what I believe were german roaches...ick. All the regular poisons I had used previously for water bugs didn't seem to have any effect. I was worried about the price because german roaches are notoriously hard to kill, but it was worth it. Since about a week after putting this out we have not seen one that was several months ago. Previously I personally was spotting roaches daily. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible and amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this product as I have boughten SEVERAL other products before to no avail. This product here is the real deal. I mean, within a week I noticed a significant drop, however, I would recommend that you continue doing retouch-ups as the eggs hatch and slowly but surely you start seeing them creep up again but stay on it weekly until you see no more. This product is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: If you know how to use them to get ride of german roaches or other roaches, u just saved $200
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to pay 299 for german roach treatment . as I found one in my kitchen . so i did my research and found that this is wat most of the pest control ppl use. They will sugar coat the rest. but if you are willing to do the hard work of moving stuff and doing this on your own , this will do the job. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Works incredibly well, Looked like a counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: I compared it to another reviews pictures to see if it was the counterfeit stuff. The product I received looked a lot closer to the counterfeit, but it was actually legit. I think the only way to know it just to use the stuff and hope for the best. We used it in the kitchen before going to bed and it the morning we were greeted with a sea of dead roachs all over the floor. This stuff is incredible. I have never seen a product work this well.
customer_reviews.author: Simman

customer_reviews.title: Took time, but works
customer_reviews.text: I had a small infestation. I tried a combination of glue traps, other poisons (four other poisons) and nothing was helping. We would see them everday. I started using this stuff. It took about 2-3 weeks to completely work and wipe them out, at least I think. I say that because I don't know if they're still here, but I haven't seen any in a week. After about half a week I put out new poison and continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Carben

customer_reviews.title: What happened, that it no longer works?
customer_reviews.text: I had bought it in the past on several occasions and it had worked excellent killing all the cockroaches in a matter of two or three days; (I rent apartments) in a week the apartments were clean of those nasty bugs, this time, I have already been more than one week and the poison has not worked, they keep coming out and I do not know if the formula has changed because it smelled very bad, like stink gas and when applied it seemed watery, I hope it works I will give it another week and if it starts to work I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Pelluco

customer_reviews.title: still working after 5 month.
customer_reviews.text: Found roaches in our new apartment. I called landlord and some guy came. Still there!! Then I bought this. Easy to use. The first night I saw roaches eating it! Next morning,GOOSEBUMP!! I hate roaches! One week later I didn't find any roaches. The bait was dried and left there. Yesterday I saw a roach, which might came from My neighbor, looked drunk. I think it ate the bait. I set the bait 5 month ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Erb

customer_reviews.title: Buy you won’t regret!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! You won’t regret!! The disgusting critters come out of hiding and start feasting immediately when you put this stuff down!!! They are instantly attracted to it!! I will continue to use this as a on going maintenance. We never had this problem before with roaches but for some reason recently we started seeing them. This stuff is what the pros use commercially and it works!! Buy Now if you want the nasty critters gone!!!
customer_reviews.author: London Abby

customer_reviews.title: Useless product
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give bad reviews as i always give my purchased product a second chance to see if it works. However, this gel bait was not what I expected as a great product at all. In the first usage, there was not a single dead roach on the floor. I tried to convince myself that I might not use it the right way. I watched several YouTube videos and tried a 2nd time, and then again I found no dead roaches. As others commented, the company might change the formulas or this is a fake product. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Vinny T

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: In-laws gave us an appliance and an infestation. This stuff worked so well I've sent it to two other people, one had the worst bug problem I'd ever seen. From what I've been told it took two applications and a little time but this stuff wiped out an infestation that I know had existed at least 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money, I'd return if I could
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed! $35 for roach gel and it doesn't work. Sure, it worked for 2 days while it was wet but once it dried it doesnt seem to work. And I don't have a roach infestation but live in Florida so you're gonna get a few and I HATE bugs. But now there seems to actually be more vugs! Unfortunately, with this you can't return it bc you have used it but Did Not Work so I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the 4-5 star reviews and kept applying it for the past one month and no results. I applied beads and lines around the cracks, cabinets and sink in my kitchen and didn’t see any results. I applied this on all four corners of the kitchen cabinet drawers and didn’t see results. I still see cockroaches big and small running inside my cabinets and on kitchen countertops when I switch on the light midnight. I tried to keep up with fresh application of this poison every time and it seems that it is not working.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rasikh

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is legit. Buy it and be impressed. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It was so satisfying to see these German cockroaches dying the next day. They shrugged off multiple poisons and I was worried I would t get a handle on them. I read the reviews of people saying it didn’t work or that it was a different formula. And thought about not buying it. I’m glad I didn’t. You will be too. One tube treated my 2 bedroom apartment. I even gave a tune to my landlord for his place. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: BESTcockroach killer , MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This cockroach medicine is the most useful one I have used over the years. After I only used two bottles, the cockroaches at home have never been seen again. I wanted to give it a try, but it gave my family a big surprise. The house has become cleaner and hygienic, especially when I woke up in the middle of the night in the kitchen and never saw a cockroach again, it felt very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia chen

customer_reviews.title: ☺️ ☺️ ☺️ ☺️.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very good it is definitely in my opinion the best of his kind of all the products that I've ever used in roach control in my years fighting those pesky Critters this stuff is top-of-the-line works as advertised ☺️.
customer_reviews.author: The Salim-Jimenez Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that actually works on cock roaches. I live in a 10 story apartment building and not everyone is as clean as they should be. Whenever they move out ,most of the time some of the apartments are filthy, the people just did not care and cockroaches love that!. The exterminator told me, "yeah, this is a pretty good product" and coming from a professional that is good news.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with 4 gel bait syringes. All used only in my kitchen and the results amazing. It brings cockroaches out of their hidden places dizzy. You can then finish them with anything or let them die by themselves. It will bring all out including the babies. I still need to put one and a half that remains for inside cabinets, but just outside cabinets all around was enough. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Knocked em out quickly and efficiently
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrible issue and tried everything and I mean everything and nothing worked. I purchased these and the Harris spray in yellow bottle and the combo knocked them out quick! I even have some left if needed. I enthusiastically recommend these if you have any issues with cockroaches. And they are safe if you have dogs. One of mine found where I put some and licked it up, had no issues at all, ingredients are safe.
customer_reviews.author: Chris krohe

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a road house, and during the summer time I have problems with cockroaches. I saw an ad on Facebook and decided to get this brand. It came with four tubes so there are plenty when you need them. Easy to apply the baits, I use it mostly around the kitchen area. After one night I saw a few roaches dead lying around, now it's been a few days since and I can tell the difference. I not sure if it's %100 percent works, but I can see it's really reduce a lot of the roaches. I would recommend this to my family if they need it.
customer_reviews.author: KhoaTran

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this item.... if you have any kind of roach infestation this item is good to use it gets rid of them and keeps them away.... I recommend quarterly maintenance around your home or office...... Safe around animals and children as long as you keep trying to reach of either both.....Allow at least a month for full affect place in strategic areas
customer_reviews.author: Zhenman

customer_reviews.title: Apply Small Dots!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and quite effective. At first I noticed more bugs than usual, I believe they're attracted to the slight yeasty smell this gives off. After apply a bit more in more spots I haven't noticed any at all. My friend has this and recommends doing small dots, instead of lines. The lines dry out more easily and I believe it lets off too much attraction aroma (I don't smell it)
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyp

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING. A family member moved in with me and brought along these pesky roaches. We tried Everything and couldn’t get rid of them. I’m so happy we found this. I am sure we’re almost roach free!!!! I literally stopped inviting people over because it’s so embarrassing. Yes, I am a clean person and never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After spending a whole lot of money on buying raid , hiring exterminators and deep carpet cleaning on a rented apartment for god sake! , I still couldn't get rid of these nasty creature. They seem to have a ball on my kitchen counter. It takes a lot of time from my schedule to clean up every single day because I cannot stand dirty house. No matter how much I clean , they seem to come back with full force. So I searched through internet and found this product and it worked. Its just been few days and I already recieved my second batch. I will update if I get rid of them completely.
customer_reviews.author: ankita

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am desperately trying to get rid of roaches in my house for a little over a year now. I bought this gel bait thinking I would finally find the fix for those disgusting bugs especially with these awesome reviews but after following instructions to the T it did absolutely nothing, I haven’t found not one dead roach! I really wanted this to finally be the thing to bring them down but unfortunately they are still there!
customer_reviews.author: MSkylarL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help to kill the cockroach
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and appearance design looks delicate. But it's very easy to dry after applying it. I apply almost every day, but seems not effective! I've never seen a dead cockroach and there seems no reduced number. After three tubes were used out, I tried Combat... I can't believe that is much better than this!!! only tried once and I saw many dead bodies. I'm not making ads, just want everyone can get rid of disgusting cockroach ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: After spending hundreds of dollars on glue traps and sprays I decided to try this product. I wasn't going to get my hopes up on it getting rid of all the cockroaches although there is many good reviews. Well to my surprise it did the job it claims. The roaches love eating this product. After 24 hours there were many cockroaches dead on my kitchen floor. Over the next 3 days more were found dead on my kitchen floor. I have not seen any roaches in the last 4 days. I would highly recommend Advion Cockroach Gel Bait. I still have 1 full tube left. If ever in need of this product in the future I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Clements

customer_reviews.title: Not as good this time
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work, I’ve had this product before a few years ago at a pet residence and it worked so well, this one didn’t work that well. Not sure if I just got a bad batch or what because it worked like a miracle before!
customer_reviews.author: Weirdpup13

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first.
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this I was expecting big results. I do think that I hindered the process though, because once they started dying I could not help myself, I haadddd to sweep them up and get rid of the filthy little invaders! If I remember correctly the instructions advised against that. I was hoping to never see another bug again, but unfortunately I did. I ended up buying the gel combat sticks from Walmart and that took care of it....it was a lot cheaper too. Just my honest opinion of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Two days later, roaches full of energy
customer_reviews.text: Two days since the place was treated and no single dead roach. They are still running around full of energy and joy as before treatment. Very dissapointed. Ordered a replacement then changed my mind as I am pretty sure the batch will be the same. Oh, moreover, this item came without any expiration date. Very convenient, how would we know if the item had been expired already?
customer_reviews.author: Di Tol

customer_reviews.title: it worked for us
customer_reviews.text: all I have to say is that we don't have a roach issue anymore Also dont use all tubes at once because the paste does get hard after a few days. Use what you need where you need it. Save the rest for a later application.
customer_reviews.author: efrain canuelas

customer_reviews.title: I am blown away it worked so good. Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Best produce ever I tried Boric acid I tried Home defense I tried bombs and roach hotels, they sprayed nothing worked for the infestation. But this product wow just wow I am blown away everywhere I look dead roaches. I really hope the never change the ingredients this stuff really works. I live in an apartment so I know a few will probably come back I will absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Sadly we have a rental house that's got a pretty bad infestation (cabinets were FULL). I put dots of this around the house and you see them swarming to it. They're now dead all over the house (gross!). I do have to repeat it a lot, but it's definitely worked. This house was the worst case I've ever seen, and it's taken all 4 tubes. worth it though
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Made worst
customer_reviews.text: When I get new renters roaches come, soon as a new renter on ground level roaches came. I used this product one time before it worked amazing. When I bought this product second time I did the same procedure as the first one. I put it on ground level kitchen and upper level kitchen. The roaches like to come out at night to eat the bait, where there is no light on and no movement. After weeks go by no difference, i think it got worst. Two roaches where seen in the upper level bathroom. So I put bait and After one week there is more in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Addis

customer_reviews.title: READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: Better yet, pull the product up on a YouTube video as not much in the way of instructions is provided by the manufacturer. I first bought one tube of the product at the "Do It Yourself" store and it obviously worked. The salesman gave me a good lesson on how to use it. Simple! Sparingly! I then purchased the multi pack on Amazon to finish the job and maintain the areas.
customer_reviews.author: skyshot

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works, and results are obvious. So happy I got hold of this product
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing result. I was so tired of trying different products for roaches but none would give a promising result. My aunt told me to try this advion product. I followed the instructions and used it in my kitchen and wow the next morning I woke up I saw 10 of them lying on the floor, it turns out for the next two days I was cleaning up dead roaches from my floor. It worked right away. I had to apply just once. The best part is the roaches come out in the open and die so I don’t have to dig for their bodies in the cabinets. So far the best and most effective solution .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! Wish I would have found out about it Sooner. I admit when I saw the package I thought the tubes were too small and it was not going to be enough but I was wrong. As soon as I put it on the spots where I keep seeing them, they ran right up to bait and started eating it. They love it and so do I! I’m still sweeping up dead ones off the floor and I only used 2 tubes from the 4! I’m recommending this to anyone who has a roach problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus And Lila

customer_reviews.title: Find the nest and they are all gone very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as directed. Be sure to read the directions. I put some in places where I was seeing them. Had dead roaches for a few days then I noticed a few at a different spot. Then investigating that I found the nest and applied more around the nest. Then there were tons of dead roaches for a few days and all were gone shortly after. If you can find the nest and get your bait there you'll be roach free very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: This solved a very bad German Roach problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought is product based on other reviews and they were not wrong! Product is very easy to dispense, and not noticeable. You will start seeing the dead ones in about 8 to 10 hours. It took 7 days to clear the space and I had to use an Insect Growth Regulator (IGR) in conjunction with this product. About 15 days now and no bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McClure

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: First time, when purchased I got rid of cockroaches so fast. Worked so well, I didn’t even see any. Second time I purchased after 2 years, I put it everywhere but now working little slowly because I’ve seem a few of them every other day
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not really effective
customer_reviews.text: I don't have an infestation of roaches, but noticed one too many recently in my apartment. In light of this, I purchased this product. It is easy to apply and initially, I thought it was having an effect on them. However, after a few days, it seemed that the roaches were still present. So far it hasn't worked for me as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hondo

product_meta.title: Syngenta 383920 Advion Cockroach Gel Bait 4 X 30 Gram Tubes Roach Control, 4 30, Brown
product_meta.description: Advice Roach gel bait This is for - 4 tubes 30G each, 1 plunger, 2 tips. Not sold in NY
feature_bullets: Dupont advice cockroach gel bait can be used in single and multi-family residential buildings, schools, commercial and industrial facilities (including warehouses, apartments, supermarkets, restaurants, motels, hotels, hospitals, food handling/storage establishments), and transportation equipment such as aircraft, trains, ships, boats, buses

Treatment rates for all uses: for heavy infestations of cockroaches, apply 3 to 5 spots of advice cockroach gel bait per 10 linear feet for light to moderate infestations of cockroaches, apply 1-3 spots of advice cockroach gel bait per 10 linear feet each spot of advice gel bait Should equal about. 5 grams (approx. 1/4" Diameter)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,981 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
